# import data
```{r}
variants_data <- read.csv('covid19_variants.csv')
variants_data
```
```{r}
no_total_and_other <- variants_data[variants_data$variant_name != "Total" & variants_data$variant_name != "Other",]
```


# call ggplot2 from library to use the package
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=no_total_and_other, aes(as.Date(date), percentage, color=variant_name)) + 
  geom_line()
```
